definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">if (entity instanceof Player _player && !_player.level().isClientSide() && world != null) {&#10;	long time = Math.abs(_player.level().getDayTime());&#10;&#10;	int daytime = (int)(time % 24000);&#10;	int mins = (int)(Math.round(daytime / 16.6));&#10;&#10;	long day = time / 24000 + 1;&#10;	int hour = mins / 60 + 6;&#10;	int min = mins % 60;&#10;&#10;	if (hour >= 24) {&#10;		hour -= 24;&#10;	}&#10;&#10;	MinewatchModVariables.MapVariables.get(world).NowTimeText = String.format("Day %d %02d:%02d", day, hour, min);&#10;	MinewatchModVariables.MapVariables.get(world).markSyncDirty();&#10;}&#10;</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="variables_get_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:NowTimeText</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
